holdings.theme: Higher-for-Longer Cost of Capital and Balance-Sheet Discipline: An elevated cost of capital versus the 2010s rewards companies with pricing power, free cash flow, and conservative leverage while pressuring long-duration and capital-intensive models; beneficiaries include insurers and brokers in hard markets, selective banks with stable deposits and fee income, cash-rich tech and industrials, and buyback or dividend growers, while overlevered CRE and rate-sensitive yield proxies remain challenged. (through May 2026)
